To get started, clone the"," ",["$","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/primefaces/sakai-react","className":"font-medium hover:underline","children":"repository"}]," ","from GitHub and install the dependencies with npm or yarn."]}],["$","pre",null,{"className":"app-code","children":["$","code",null,{"children":"\"npm install\" or \"yarn\""}]}],["$","p",null,{"children":["Next step is running the application using the start script and navigate to ",["$","b",null,{"children":"http://localhost:3000/"}]," to view the application. That is it, you may now start with the development of your application using the Sakai template."]}],["$","pre",null,{"className":"app-code","children":["$","code",null,{"children":"\"npm run dev\" or \"yarn dev\""}]}],["$","h5",null,{"children":"Dependencies"}],["$","p",null,{"children":"Dependencies of Sakai are listed below and needs to be defined at package.json."}],["$","pre",null,{"className":"app-code","children":["$","code",null,{"children":"\"primereact\": \"^9.6.2\",                    //required: PrimeReact components\n\"primeicons\": \"^6.0.1\",                    //required: Icons\n\"primeflex\": \"^3.3.0\",                     //required: Utility CSS classes\n"}]}],["$","h5",null,{"children":"Structure"}],["$","p",null,{"children":"Sakai consist of a couple of folders where demos and core layout have been separated."}],["$","p",null,{"children":["There are two"," ",["$","a",null,{"href":"https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/routing/route-groups","className":"font-medium hover:underline","children":"root groups"}]," ","under the app folder; ",["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":"(main)"}]," represents the pages that reside in the main dashboard layout whereas ",["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":"(full-page)"}]," ","groups the pages with full page content such as landing page or a login page."]}],["$","ul",null,{"className":"line-height-3","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":"layout/"}],": Main layout files"]}],["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":"demo/"}],": Contains demo related utilities and helpers"]}],["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":"app/"}],": Demo pages"]}],["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":"public/demo"}],": Assets used in demos"]}],["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":"public/layout"}],": Assets used in layout such as a logo"]}],["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":"styles/demo"}],": Styles used in demos only"]}],["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":"styles/layout"}],": SCSS files of the core layout"]}]]}],["$","h5",null,{"children":"Route Groups"}],["$","p",null,{"children":["Root Layout is the main of the application and it is defined at ",["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":"app/layout.tsx"}]," file. It contains the style imports and layout context provider."]}],["$","pre",null,{"className":"app-code","children":["$","code",null,{"children":"\"use client\"\nimport { LayoutProvider } from \"./layout/context/layoutcontext\";\nimport { PrimeReactProvider } from \"primereact/api\";\nimport \"primereact/resources/primereact.css\";\n...\nimport \"../styles/layout/layout.scss\";\nimport \"../styles/demo/Demos.scss\";\n\ninterface RootLayoutProps {\n  children: React.ReactNode;\n}\n\nexport default function RootLayout({ children }: RootLayoutProps) {\n  return (\n    <html lang=\"en\" suppressHydrationWarning>\n      <head>\n        <link\n          id=\"theme-css\"\n          href={`/themes/lara-light-indigo/theme.css`}\n          rel=\"stylesheet\"\n        ></link>\n      </head>\n      <body>\n        <PrimeReactProvider>\n            <LayoutProvider>{children}</LayoutProvider>\n        </PrimeReactProvider>\n      </body>\n    </html>\n  );\n}\n\n"}]}],["$","p",null,{"children":["The pages that are using the layout elements need to be defined under the ",["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":["app/","(main)","/"]}]," folder. Those pages use the"," ",["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":["app/","(main)","/layout.tsx"]}]," as the root layout."]}],["$","pre",null,{"className":"app-code","children":["$","code",null,{"children":"import { Metadata } from 'next';\nimport Layout from \"../../layout/layout\";\n\ninterface MainLayoutProps {\n  children: React.ReactNode;\n}\n\nexport const metadata: Metadata = {\n    title: \"Sakai by PrimeReact | Free Admin Template for NextJS\",\n    ...\n  };\n\nexport default function MainLayout({ children }: MainLayoutProps) {\n  return <Layout>{children}</Layout>;\n}\n"}]}],["$","p",null,{"children":["Only the pages that are using config sidebar wihout layout elements need to be defined under the ",["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":["app/","(full-page)","/"]}]," folder. Those pages use the"," ",["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":["app/","(full-page)","/layout.tsx"]}]," as the root layout."]}],["$","pre",null,{"className":"app-code","children":["$","code",null,{"children":"import { Metadata } from 'next';\nimport AppConfig from \"../../layout/AppConfig\";\nimport React from \"react\";\n\ninterface FullPageLayoutProps {\n  children: React.ReactNode;\n}\n\nexport const metadata: Metadata = {\n    title: \"Sakai by PrimeReact | Free Admin Template for NextJS\",\n    ...\n  };\n\nexport default function FullPageLayout({ children }: FullPageLayoutProps) {\n  return (\n    <React.Fragment>\n      {children}\n      <AppConfig minimal />\n    </React.Fragment>\n  );\n}\n"}]}],["$","h5",null,{"children":"Default Configuration"}],["$","p",null,{"children":["Initial layout configuration can be defined at the ",["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":"layout/context/layoutcontext.js"}]," file, this step is optional and only necessary when customizing the defaults."]}],["$","pre",null,{"className":"app-code","children":["$","code",null,{"children":"\"use client\";\nimport React, { useState } from 'react';\nimport Head from 'next/head';\nexport const LayoutContext = React.createContext();\n\nexport const LayoutProvider = (props) => {\n    const [layoutConfig, setLayoutConfig] = useState({\n        ripple: false,                          //toggles ripple on and off\n        inputStyle: 'outlined',                 //default style for input elements\n        menuMode: 'static',                     //layout mode of the menu, valid values are \"static\" or \"overlay\"\n        colorScheme: 'light',                   //color scheme of the template, valid values are \"light\", \"dim\" and \"dark\"\n        theme: 'lara-light-indigo',             //default component theme for PrimeReact\n        scale: 14                               //size of the body font size to scale the whole application\n    });\n}"}]}],["$","h5",null,{"children":"Menu"}],["$","p",null,{"children":["Main menu is defined at ",["$","span",null,{"className":"text-primary font-medium","children":"AppMenu.js"}]," file based on"," ",["$","a",null,{"href":"https://www.primefaces.org/primereact/menumodel/","className":"font-medium hover:underline","children":"MenuModel API"}],"."]}],["$","h5",null,{"children":"Integration with Existing NextJS Applications"}],["$","p",null,{"children":"Only the folders related to the layout need to be moved into your project. Integration of pages involves moving the files under those folders. Make sure that the using page is defined under the related group layout."}],["$","h5",null,{"children":"PrimeReact Theme"}],["$","p",null,{"children":["Sakai theming is based on the PrimeReact theme being used. Default theme is ",["$","b",null,{"children":"lara-light-indigo"}],"."]}],["$","h5",null,{"children":"SASS Variables"}],["$","p",null,{"children":["In case you'd like to customize the main layout variables, open ",["$","b",null,{"children":"_variables.scss"}]," file under layout folder. Saving the changes will be reflected instantly at your browser."]}],["$","h6",null,{"children":"layout/_variables.scss"}],["$","pre",null,{"className":"app-code","lang":"scss","children":["$","code",null,{"children":"\n/* General */\n$scale:14px;                    /* initial font size */ \n$borderRadius:12px;             /* border radius of layout element e.g. card, sidebar */ \n$transitionDuration:.2s;        /* transition duration of layout elements e.g. sidebar */ \n"}]}]]}]}]}],null],"segment":"__PAGE__"},"styles":[]}],"segment":"documentation"},"styles":[]}]}],null],"segment":"(main)"},"styles":[]}],"params":{}}],null]
